equations.EQ:1: {\text{rate of diffusion}=\,\frac{{\text{amount of gas passing through an area}}}{{\text{unit of time}}}}
equations.EQ:3: {\frac{{\text{rate of effusion of A}}}{{\text{rate of effusion of B}}}\,=\,\frac{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{\text{B}}}}}}{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{\text{A}}}}}}}
equations.EQ:4: {\frac{{\text{rate of effusion of hydrogen}}}{{\text{rate of effusion of oxygen}}}\,=\,\frac{{\sqrt{{32\,{{{\text{g mol}}}^{{\text{−1}}}}}}}}{{\sqrt{{2\,{{{\text{g mol}}}^{{\text{−1}}}}}}}}\,=\,\frac{{\sqrt{{16}}}}{{\sqrt{1}}}\,=\,\frac{4}{1}}
equations.EQ:8: {\frac{{\text{rate of effusion of gas Xe}}}{{\text{rate of effusion of gas Ne}}}\,=\,\frac{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{{\text{Ne}}}}}}}{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{{\text{Xe}}}}}}}}
equations.EQ:9: {{{\text{amount of Xe transferred}}{\text{time for Xe}}}{\frac{{\text{amount of Ne transferred}}}{{\text{time for Ne}}}}\,=\,\frac{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{{\text{Ne}}}}}}}{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{{\text{Xe}}}}}}}}
equations.EQ:10: {{{{\text{amount of Xe}}}{\text{time for Xe}}}{\frac{{{\text{amount of Ne}}}}{{\text{time for Ne}}}}\,=\,\frac{{\text{time for Ne}}}{{\text{time for Xe}}}\,=\,\frac{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{{\text{Ne}}}}}}}{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{{\text{Xe}}}}}}}\,=\,\frac{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{{\text{Ne}}}}}}}{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{{\text{Xe}}}}}}}}
equations.EQ:15: {\frac{{\text{rate of effusion of Unknown}}}{{{{\text{rate of effusion of CO}}}_{2}}}\,=\,\frac{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{{{\text{CO}}2}}}}}}{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{{Unknown}}}}}}}
equations.EQ:18: {\text{rate of diffusion}=\,\frac{{\text{amount of gas passing through an area}}}{{\text{unit of time}}}}
equations.EQ:19: {\frac{{\text{rate of effusion of gas A}}}{{\text{rate of effusion of gas B}}}\,=\,\frac{{\sqrt{{{m}_{B}}}}}{{\sqrt{{{m}_{A}}}}}\,=\,\frac{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{B}}}}}{{\sqrt{{{\text{ℳ}}_{A}}}}}}
equations.EQ:20: {{({\frac{{\text{rate A}}}{{\text{rate B}}}})}={{{({\frac{{\text{molar mass of B}}}{{\text{molar mass of A}}}})}}}^{{1\text{/}2}}.}
